date.description: The date when the sharing activity occurred.

channel_id.description: The unique identifier of the YouTube channel.

video_id.description: The unique identifier of the YouTube video being shared.

live_or_on_demand.description: Indicates whether the video shared was streamed live or was on-demand.

subscribed_status.description: The subscription status of the viewer who shared the video (subscribed or unsubscribed).

country_code.description: The country code of the viewer interacting with the sharing service.

sharing_service.description: The name or type of sharing service used to share the video.

shares.description: The number of times the video was shared on a particular sharing service.
